import React from "react"; import css from './style.module.css' import ProductSize from '../ProductSize' const Index = (props) => { console.log("props", props) console.log("props", props.eventLoading) return (

{props.errorMsg.link.show && props.errorMsg.link.message}

{props.errorMsg.name.show && props.errorMsg.name.message}

{props.errorMsg.price.show && props.errorMsg.price.message}

{props.errorMsg.price.show && props.errorMsg.price.message}

{ props.handleInputChange(event) }} id="exampleInputFile" /> {/* */}

{props.errorMsg.image.show && props.errorMsg.image.message}

{props.sizes.map((el, index) => { return })}
); }; export default Index;
